===Etymology 2===
{{zh-forms|alt=乹}}

From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*m-ka-n||heaven, sky, sun}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|མཁའ}}, {{m|bo|ནམ་མཁའ||sky, heaven}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{zh-pron

|ma=y
|c=kin4

|h=pfs=khièn
|mc=2
|oc=2,2
|cat=n,pn
}}

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# One of the Eight [[trigram|Trigrams]] ([[☰]]).
#: {{zh-x|乾[乾]道|ways of heaven; natural law}}
# {{†}} [[sky]]; [[heaven]]
# {{†}} [[sun]]
# {{†}} [[emperor]]
# {{†}} [[man]], [[male]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
